name: SpaceSerp Search
description: Performs a Google search using the SpaceSerp API. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

apiKey.name: apiKey
apiKey.info: API key to authorize the request.

code.value:
from typing import Union
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, IntInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool
import requests

class SpaceSerpSearchComponent(Component):
    display_name = "SpaceSerp Search"
    description = "Performs a Google search using the SpaceSerp API."
    icon = "search"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="apiKey",
            display_name="API Key",
            info="API key to authorize the request.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="q",
            display_name="Search Query",
            info="The search term to be used in the query.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="location",
            display_name="Location",
            info="Location where the query is executed.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="domain",
            display_name="Google Domain",
            info="Google domain that performs the search.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="gl",
            display_name="Country",
            info="Indicates the country for the Google results page.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="hl",
            display_name="Language",
            info="Specifies the language for the Google results page interface.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="resultFormat",
            display_name="Result Format",
            options=["json", "csv", "html"],
            info="Format of the search results.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="device",
            display_name="Device",
            options=["desktop", "mobile", "tablet"],
            info="The device that performed the search.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="mobileOs",
            display_name="Mobile Operating System",
            options=["ios", "android"],
            info="Operating system of the mobile device (if applicable).",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="pageSize",
            display_name="Page Size",
            info="Number of results per page (1 to 100).",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="pageNumber",
            display_name="Page Number",
            info="Results page number.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Search Results", name="search_results", method="fetch_search_results"),
        Output(display_name="Tool", name="tool", method="build_tool"),
    ]

    def fetch_search_results(self) -> Union[Data, list[Data]]:
        params = {
            "apiKey": self.apiKey,
            "q": self.q,
            "location": self.location,
            "domain": self.domain,
            "gl": self.gl,
            "hl": self.hl,
            "resultFormat": self.resultFormat,
            "device": self.device,
            "mobileOs": self.mobileOs,
            "pageSize": self.pageSize,
            "pageNumber": self.pageNumber,
        }

        # Remove par창metros que n찾o foram definidos (vazios ou None)
        params = {k: v for k, v in params.items() if v}

        url = "https://api.spaceserp.com/google/search"
        
        response = requests.get(url, params=params)
        response.raise_for_status()
        
        results = response.json()
        data = Data(data={"results": results})
        self.status = data
        return data

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        def tool_function(query: str):
            params = {
                "apiKey": self.apiKey,
                "q": query,
                "location": self.location,
                "domain": self.domain,
                "gl": self.gl,
                "hl": self.hl,
                "resultFormat": self.resultFormat,
                "device": self.device,
                "mobileOs": self.mobileOs,
                "pageSize": self.pageSize,
                "pageNumber": self.pageNumber,
            }
            
            # Remover par창metros que n찾o foram definidos (vazios ou None)
            params = {k: v for k, v in params.items() if v}
            
            url = "https://api.spaceserp.com/google/search"
            
            response = requests.get(url, params=params)
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            results = response.json()
            return results

        return Tool(
            name="space_serp_search",
            description="Performs a Google search using the SpaceSerp API.",
            func=tool_function,
        )

from typing import Union
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, IntInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool
import requests

class SpaceSerpSearchComponent(Component):
    display_name = "SpaceSerp Search"
    description = "Performs a Google search using the SpaceSerp API."
    icon = "search"

    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="apiKey",
            display_name="API Key",
            info="API key to authorize the request.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="q",
            display_name="Search Query",
            info="The search term to be used in the query.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="location",
            display_name="Location",
            info="Location where the query is executed.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="domain",
            display_name="Google Domain",
            info="Google domain that performs the search.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="gl",
            display_name="Country",
            info="Indicates the country for the Google results page.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="hl",
            display_name="Language",
            info="Specifies the language for the Google results page interface.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="resultFormat",
            display_name="Result Format",
            options=["json", "csv", "html"],
            info="Format of the search results.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="device",
            display_name="Device",
            options=["desktop", "mobile", "tablet"],
            info="The device that performed the search.",
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="mobileOs",
            display_name="Mobile Operating System",
            options=["ios", "android"],
            info="Operating system of the mobile device (if applicable).",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="pageSize",
            display_name="Page Size",
            info="Number of results per page (1 to 100).",
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="pageNumber",
            display_name="Page Number",
            info="Results page number.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Search Results", name="search_results", method="fetch_search_results"),
        Output(display_name="Tool", name="tool", method="build_tool"),
    ]

    def fetch_search_results(self) -> Union[Data, list[Data]]:
        params = {
            "apiKey": self.apiKey,
            "q": self.q,
            "location": self.location,
            "domain": self.domain,
            "gl": self.gl,
            "hl": self.hl,
            "resultFormat": self.resultFormat,
            "device": self.device,
            "mobileOs": self.mobileOs,
            "pageSize": self.pageSize,
            "pageNumber": self.pageNumber,
        }

        # Remove par창metros que n찾o foram definidos (vazios ou None)
        params = {k: v for k, v in params.items() if v}

        url = "https://api.spaceserp.com/google/search"
        
        response = requests.get(url, params=params)
        response.raise_for_status()
        
        results = response.json()
        data = Data(data={"results": results})
        self.status = data
        return data

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        def tool_function(query: str):
            params = {
                "apiKey": self.apiKey,
                "q": query,
                "location": self.location,
                "domain": self.domain,
                "gl": self.gl,
                "hl": self.hl,
                "resultFormat": self.resultFormat,
                "device": self.device,
                "mobileOs": self.mobileOs,
                "pageSize": self.pageSize,
                "pageNumber": self.pageNumber,
            }
            
            # Remover par창metros que n찾o foram definidos (vazios ou None)
            params = {k: v for k, v in params.items() if v}
            
            url = "https://api.spaceserp.com/google/search"
            
            response = requests.get(url, params=params)
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            results = response.json()
            return results

        return Tool(
            name="space_serp_search",
            description="Performs a Google search using the SpaceSerp API.",
            func=tool_function,
        )
